name: AfterRunner
description:
AFTERRUNNER is a short, yet colorful and nostalgic shooter/runner mashup. Inspired by Space Harrier and Super Monkey Ball's Monkey Shot minigame, AFTERRUNNER puts you in the body of a robot whose mission is simple, yet challenging: to shoot the enemies that appear in your way. Don't lose your health, either!

Special thanks to:
Freesound.org for the audio. (users: Sirkoto51, n-audioman, tissman, myfox14, davidoburke, and henryrichard)
Mixamo for the character base.
Sketchfab (user: Wawann) for the rifle model.
